message: Starting JSONL logging integration test. Planning to deploy test agent and verify logging functionality.
Deployed test agent (simple_test_agent-212031-9d5ba0). Waiting 30s for it to execute and create JSONL log.

CRITICAL ISSUE FOUND: JSONL logging NOT working. (1) Logs directory not created: /logs/ doesn't exist in workspace. (2) get_agent_output tail parameter NOT working - tail=10 still returns 32K+ tokens. (3) Implementation changes NOT active in running MCP server. Root cause: MCP server needs restart to load new code OR deployment_modifier changes weren't applied correctly.

Integration testing COMPLETE. Deliverables: (1) Comprehensive test report (integration_test_results.md) with 6 test results, evidence, root cause analysis. (2) Test agent deployed and executed successfully (simple_test_agent-212031-9d5ba0). (3) CRITICAL FINDING reported: JSONL implementation NOT active in running MCP server - all tests FAILED. (4) Root cause identified: Server needs restart to load 707 lines of new code. (5) Evidence collected: logs directory missing, tail parameter ignored (32K+ tokens returned for tail=10). Verdict: FAIL - MCP server restart required. Clear actionable next steps provided.
